param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.

param.help: Use this remind you what the job was for.
param.label: Title for the output file

param.name: ownFile
param.help: This option works best for relatively small genomes. If you are working with large human-sized genomes, send request to Galaxy team for adding your reference to this Galaxy instance by using 'Help' link at the top of Galaxy interface.
